ygData.subject: Re: Ideas...
ygData.msgSnippet: Another quick note. . . I have actually seen the fireworks going off!! In Kelethin on the new server on the second night. . . . actually fireworks in the sky.
ygData.messageBody:
Another quick note. . .

I have actually seen the fireworks going off!! In Kelethin on the new server
on the second night. . . . actually fireworks in the sky. . .couldn't
believe it. . now based that the highest level at this time was only bout
8ish. . must have been a GM. . there was one online. . and that was the
busiest zone . . . I did shout out to see who was making them but got no
response.

However it does provide me with that glimmer that they are out there just
waiting to be found. . if you haven't seen them go off. . its green/blueish
trails going up. . which explode in the big firework white fashion. . jsut
thought. . . DAMN shoulda taken a screenie =(

Wibblers
----- Original Message -----
From: <Nilen23@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Saturday, October 16, 1999 2:34 AM
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Ideas...


> From: Nilen23@...
>
> None of what I mention here are facts so don't take them as facts. I am
just
> going from what little I now.
>
> While I was riding on the boat to fp i decided to bring some reading
> along. (EX: tinkering books). While reading it over I was thinking if any
of
> these things could be hints on how to make some other stuff or find the
> missing book. Well here are some suggestions to check into. Talk to King
> Akannon about it. In the book it mentions at the begging he is writing it
for
> him or something along those lines. His wife might be in the game (not
sure).
> He mentions her in the books as compassvess or something close to that. He
> named the compass after her. Maybe she has something about it. Talk to the
> zookeeper cause he was the one that practically sent them to the mino
caves
> to get a minotaur for the zoo. Try killing the minotaur in the zoo. He
might
> somehow have the book. Thats all I could think of about this. If anyone
else
> has some ideas send them in.
>
> Also I was thinking of some gnomish firework recipes. Maybe we have to add
a
> stalking probe and a flask of water and maybe some other item to make the
> fireworks. It mentions in one of the books that he was worried about the
> scouts exploding when the were doing something and he mentions a something
> about a flask of water with it. Maybe add a metal rod or that cheaper rod
> thing for the stalking probe to shoot out of when it comes in contact with
> the water. shoots in the air and explodes. I dunno don't take these
litteraly
> and rely on them alot. There just some guesses i thought of.
>
> >
